titleStmt.title: An easy and compendious introduction for reading all sorts of histories: contrived, in a more facile way then heretofore hath been published, out of the papers of Mathias Prideaux Mr of Arts and sometime fellow of Exeter Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, Mathias, 1622-1646?
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Leonard Lichfield] for Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: "Of politicall history in generall" and "Of the history of successions in states, countries, or families" each have separate dated title page with "printed by Leonard Lichfield" in imprint; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
